English
The Bellas are back, and they are better than ever. After being humiliated
in front of none other than the President of the United States of America,
the Bellas are taken out of the Aca-Circuit. In order to clear their name
and regain their status, the Bellas take on a seemingly impossible task:
winning an International competition no American team has ever won. In order
to accomplish this monumental task, they need to strengthen the bonds of
friendship and sisterhood, and blow away the competition with their amazing
aca-magic! With all new friends and old rivals tagging along for the trip,
the Bellas can hopefully accomplish their dreams once again.
